hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select {limits.*} from Limits limits where limits.LIMIT_TYPE in ('OBSTRUCTION_FOR_AMOUNT_OPERATIONS', 'OVERALL_AMOUNT_PER_DAY', 'IMSI') and limits.CHANNEL_TYPE = :extra_channelType and (limits.LIMIT_TYPE = 'OVERALL_AMOUNT_PER_DAY' or limits.TB = :extra_tb) -- учитываем только подтвержденные лимиты and limits.STATE = 'CONFIRMED' and current_date >= limits.START_DATE and ( limits.END_DATE is null or limits.END_DATE > current_date )
union
select {limits.*} from Limits limits left join GROUPS_RISK groupRisk on limits.GROUP_RISK_ID = groupRisk.ID where limits.LIMIT_TYPE = 'GROUP_RISK' and limits.TB = :extra_tb -- учитываем только подтвержденные лимиты and limits.STATE = 'CONFIRMED' and limits.SECURITY_TYPE = :extra_securityType and limits.CHANNEL_TYPE = :extra_channelType and current_date >= limits.START_DATE and ( limits.END_DATE is null or limits.END_DATE > current_date )
